overview:
Jonathan Mohoney joined Investor Growth Capital’s information technology team in 2012.

Prior to joining IGC, Jon spent two years in Deutsche Bank’s Technology Investment Banking Group where he focused on advisory and capital markets coverage for the hardware and communications sectors. In addition, Jon worked as an analyst at Credit Suisse in the Technology Investment Banking Group.

Jon received a B.B.A. in Finance from the University of Wisconsin.

When Jon is out of the office, he enjoys playing tennis, alpine skiing and scuba diving.
